content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling cross country and had just checked out(very early) of a motel. driving west on interstate 70 about 100 miles east of kansas city (in missouri).It was very early in the morning, right around dawn/twilight.The sun was just about ready to rise.There were heavy dark clouds very low to the ground all around. the kind of clouds that would probably turn into summer rain storms later in the day.There were large fields of tall corn on both sides of the road. i had the drivers side window down, finishing a cup of coffee, driving about 55-60 mph. i was admiring the beautiful scenery when i noticed a light glowing inside the dark low cloud to my left (south). it kept getting brighter and brighter when suddenly the object/ufo appeared, drifting at a slight angle forward, down out of the bottom of the cloud. the ufo was moving very slowly,almost hovering, parallel to my car heading west. when it came out of the cloud, it disturbed the bottom of the cloud, creating/pulling a wisp/swirl in the cloud. the ufo had a slight detectable wobble, but then straightened out as it began to pick up some speed, moving due west above the corn fields, parallel to my car. as it picked up speed it began to pull away from my car. i sped up to about 75-80 to try and keep up, the whole time i had my head out the window looking in amazement at this beautiful object as it moved ahead, right below, under the dark cloud, but fully exposed in plain sight. the ufo then slowed down, again to almost a hover, wobbled a little and then ascended upward, back into the cloud. my car caught back up to it as it disappeared back into the cloud, the bright light of it fading away.I'm not exactly sure how long this sighting lasted, but i would guess about 5 minutes or so. my immediate impression at the time was that the ufo was hiding, using the low, dark cloud as cover, and that it came down to take a look around, then went back up to hide itself again.

it was a flattened oval shape, not really a disk.
perfectly round portal type windows evenly spaced around the middle.
intense bright white light beaming out of each portal.
gold/bronze/copper, dull metallic in color.
no doors, openings, railing or any other protrusions. 
totally smooth on top and bottom. smooth all around. seamless windows.
exact size? guessing it would fit onto a football field.
the ufo was not spinning or rotating. 
the windows/portals maintained same position while craft moved. 
it made no detectable noise at any time during the observation.
it tilted slightly forward on descent and ascent.
it wobbled when hovering or moving very slowly.  
it acted like it was being controlled. steered. directed at all times.

i had a good 8 hours sleep before my drive. i was very much alert/awake. i had just stopped before the sighting to get gas and a coffee. i have no history of mental illness or hallucinations. i don't drink or do drugs. i felt the wind in my face and even pinched myself to make sure it was real. it was a totally real experience, and i'm so happy the ufo let me see it so clearly. there was nobody else on the road except for a 18 wheeler truck coming the other way, heading east. i looked at the drivers face as we passed each other. he was unaware/oblivious to the ufo.

this happened to me over 30 years ago. i've only told a few family and friends about it. i'm so grateful for the experience! i didn't have a camera at the time, but i can draw a picture if requested.

philip
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Oval/disk shaped. perfectly round circles windows/portholes, perfectly spaced,all around main body. bright beaming white light projected thru each window.

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside of backdoor to my house, after stubbing out a cigarette, i noticed a yellow-orange streak of light just at the treetop level, towards the ne. it was stationery and i didn't hear any noises. i realized we'd just had a meteor shower so figured it was a streak from a falling meteorite, didn't think too much of it, and went inside. about 45 minutes later i was outside smoking again and i was surprised to see the light was still there. it appeared to be longer though and i noticed it was pulsating. i kept staring at it and realized it hadn't moved, it was in the same place. each time after that, when i went out to smoke, i had to look for the darned light and it was still there. it didn't move but you could tell the stars gradually did. about 1:30am i went to bed. the streak seemed to get longer as the night progressed, starting out about 1/3 inch long and ending about 1 inch long. the light was gone the next morning and isn't there tonight. i'm wondering if it could have been a weather balloon high enough in the sky to catch the sun's rays? i don't know.
content.summary: Pulsating glowing stick in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was outside at around midnight smoking when i spotted what looked like an airplane headed in my direction but soon realized it was totally silent and had two white lights at the base of the craft and one red light on the nose. the object passed overhead and then reversed course. i lost sight of the object as it proceeded in the direction from whence it first came.
content.summary: Triangular shaped craft observed at night

content.detailedDescription: I was putting the dogs out and happened to notice the orange lights in the sky.  at first i thought it might be planets, but felt they were too low.  they remained stationary making a triangle, but at times they appeared to be blinking.  after witnessing this i called my wife outside and we both felt nervous and curious.  we both said, almost at the same time, is it a ufo?  then, my wife went online and saw that someone in north carolina saw the same thing.
content.summary: 3 bright orange lights making triangular shape

content.detailedDescription: Was looking up at the stars and then i see a ball of light going across the sky heading north. i was watching it thinking it was a satellite until it took off going upward angle very fast like a shooting star and dimmed to nothing within a second or two. i watched it go across the sky for about 10 sec before it took off. i know it wasn't a satellite because i observed them many times and they keep going and dim slowly and never go a different speed or direction.
content.summary: Thought it was a satellite until it went at an angle and went very fast. then dimmed fast

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting in my car listening to music when i looked up towards the stars and i saw a glowing orb going left to right this object blinked several times came to abruped stops and changed direction several times while disappearing and then it vanished.
 i went back to the same spot a few days later and got a three minute video of the same orb.
 i've seen these orbs more than 10 times in upstate new york. including lake george and saratoga.
content.summary: Orb that dematerlized

content.detailedDescription: Observed large dark orange,oval light. looked closer saw second circular light below and to the right.  there was a third transparent object ascending to the height of the rt light, looking into it i saw two slanted black eyes, looking at me the same way i looked at it.Then a light sputtered,  and the transparent object lit up like the right object. both ascended up to the oval light, and the light intensified to golden, yellow like the sun. the light grew in size and brightness, clouds formed. it looked to distort and a red after glow remained, then disappeared, i saw it about 5-8 miles in the distance. a blimp shape, but transparent, heading to the ocean. i think it was repairing, trying to blend in with the street lights and power lines, it wasn't that wide, but off in the distance it looked slightly smaller than a blimp
content.summary: 3 triangular sunlike colored lights ascending then distorting and gone 15 ft from me

content.detailedDescription:
i am a mufon member. i am also an ex field investigator when i lived in scranton, pa. i am submitting this report mainly to co-oberate report no. 78494 which occurred in nashville, tn. on 2016-07-08 as that report is exactly the same as my sighting in aug. and two weeks later in sept. of 2013.

  i was sitting on my front porch reading when i noticed a very bright (almost sun like)light approaching from the east. the sky was still blue and i needed no artificial light to aid me in reading my book.

  at first i thought it was a headlight from an approaching plane as we are not far from the avoca airport. as the light got closer i saw no red or green lights and heard absolutely no noise from the object. the very bright light was low enough and close enough that i should have seen appendages sticking out and heard a propulsion unit. it cruised toward me until it just stopped dead right across the street from my house at not too high an altitude. 

 it was about the size of a pea at arms length. it pulsated three time getting about twice as big and then returning to the pea size. after the third pulsation it immediately blinked out just as if you turned off one of your house lights. there was nothing and i mean nothing there after it blinked out.

 about two and a half weeks later i was sitting on the front porch.(by now it was the first week in sept.)once again reading at the same time of evening when the exact same event as i just described occurred once again. 

 it was a clone of my previous sighting- every thing exactly the same. only this time the eight year old nepalese neighbor kid was with me. he also saw the light and tried to take a picture of it with his phone but nothing came out. that's it ! i have seen numerous mufon reports exactly like mine.
content.summary: Very bright light moving in from east. just "cruising". came to a stop. pulsated three times then completely blinked out. two weeks later the exact same phenomenon occured.

content.detailedDescription:
Each time, 5 different occassionns, sitting on my front porch, one time with my gal friend.  i am very familair with many, many air craft, being in the usaf, living near airports most my life.  and during the summer i am outside just about any and every chance i get, but of course, mainly taking my dog out and i also just like to sit and watch the sky. 

the first one i seen, i only noticed it because of he extremely bright light, which flashed maybe one, possibly 2 second, about a 45 degree down and forward, (fantastic brightness).  then still moving from north to south, dead center of a wide open spot in front of my house it flashed the exact same way, then once more the exact same way and then it was out of view.  but the distance it traveled in such a short period of time was just incrediable.  at the altitude it traveled at and taking maybe 3 to 4 seconds, it would take a standard air liner any where from 3 minutes to around 5 minutes.  but every plane i have ever seen, you could always hear them.  these other's, well not one single sound, vibration, no sonic's, just totally quiet and amazinglly fast.  to tell the truth, i have never seen any thing move that fast, in a straight, level path fly at such an extreme speed.

and as for the other four.  same light or lights flashing out.  the only  difference was the directions they traveled.  all straight, level, varied altitudes, some moving east to west, south to north, west to east.  all on different nights, but fairly close to same times, within around a 2 hour variation.  but all as fast, silent and just so, so fast.

the last part may be or may not be related, but i had my phone outside one evening taking photo's of the red moon, (blood moon).  when i looked in my lens i could only seen the moon.  but when the photo's were saved, there was another very large object on the bottom left and on every photo.  i cannot explain this one at all.  i still have the photo's on my phone, plus i downloaded them onto my computer in order to enlarge them, but i am not a photo expert of any sort.  still, it just seemed very strange to me.  if you would like i can upload those to you if you like.

well that is all i have for now.  i sure hope to see more real soon.  but they are few and far between.  or so it seems.  and i have no night vision equipment of any type.  and sure nothing to take photo's of such fast flying objects like those others at night time.  sure wish i did.  but, such is my luck.

thank you.

very sincere,

one who does believe...

ps.  the photo's of the moon and what ever that is along with it were taken with my same old style flip phone.  if any one can figure out what the object is next to the moon, please let me know also.  i would greatly appreciate it very much.
content.summary: I live near airport, but these were faster, brighter than any i've ever seen.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Hello!
tenacity paid off, the weekend of all ufos.
in my nights of observations at the sky where i live i got the reward of field investigation about ufos here in portugal.
starting in the 13 august ending 15:
start to see not normal blue orbs pulsating, first along the coast, then over my house. i start to interact with a flashlight and i got the attention of a blue orb as you can see on the clip, then at 14 august all ufos get loose, a red ufo start to hovering and path all-over this valley even after planes, once more i try to interact making flash light signals, he was maybe at 1 and a half km high, some summer clouds was passing, he approach and start to change from stationery red to flashing copper-green, as you can see at the clip, a image speaks better than words, i am not a expert on recording images, but a cam in one hand and the other hand with a flash light i do the best i can.
day 14 start to see a blue orb and one hour later i got a shower of fireflies all over me in a angle of 90º, i fell some small electric current passing trough me i was euphoric recording with a big pain on my neck when i see a blue pulsating orb? crossing the sky from my position to nw in less than nothing, much more fast then a bullet, i was military 5 years and i know the speed of trace bullets. i know this images of fireflies are rare so far i know only nasa have. please i would like to create a dynamic in the planet with crazy people like me u likes to observe the sky to trace and triangulate this logistic movements of our friends or please help me saying and proving that what i see every day all year it is man made. for more incredible this sound it is true what its happened here in portugal, i got much more info and data about proved patterns, not table and desk theories.
i do zoom with my cheap camera there are some pixels on the images but the fireflies are very distinct as you can see, better see in a laptop or please fell free to enhance the image.
my aim is about recording all i can about this phenomenon's to the future, it is also about the security, because here its where the planes make the turns to lower or higher there flight concerning the landings.
i am a real passionate amateur astronomer and a convict ufologist u likes to hunt ufos since the 80s, the great show on earth its to looking our skies.
thank you
manuel salvador
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: During a weekend various ufos -diferent technologies of flight

content.detailedDescription: I had just sat down on the back deck for a cigarette when i noticed what looked like a planet shining in the sky above me. it was nearing dusk but still very much daylight; the bats were out for the evening, but the birds were still out as well. i sit in this spot often and observe the sky, so i knew that the light was unusual, but it looked so much like a planet i thought there might be some unusual celestial event that i wasn't aware of. i grabbed a star chart from inside and was trying to figure out what it could be when my boyfriend walked out to join me. he is a scientist and so operates with a very logical mind, so i'm very grateful that he was there as a second witness. he used his iphone sky app to try and identify it, but there shouldn't have been anything there. as we were both watching, the light brightened for a brief moment, returned to it's previous brightness for a few seconds, and then simply disappeared. i estimate the total time i observed it at approximately 5 to 7 minutes.
content.summary: Star-like, but not a star. brightened, dimmed, and disappeared in daylight.

content.detailedDescription: I had been sitting on my new deck watching the sun go down.  once the sky darkens i like to watch the stars and look for airplanes as they fly over.  i had my binoculars out, watching a few planes when i looked to my side and saw a really bright light coming toward me.  i just stood there thinking "am i really seeing something that's not a plane". then it hit me to pick up my binoculars and look at it.  although it was moving fast, it was much slower than a plane, with no colored or blinking lights.   i brought my binoculars down and listen for an engine. there was absolutely no sound at all.  i finally had the sense to pick up my cell phone and snap a few shots as it flew above my house.   it just flew toward the north in a straight silent very bright manner.  the brightness was similar to the light of the moon.  it was definitely not a plane.  i watched it until i couldn't see it for my house any longer.
content.summary: Very clear light, much brighter than the stars flying in a silent straight line

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday august 14th, 2016 at 10pm, i had pointed out two very brights stars in the southern sky to my friend and commented how bright the stars were.
my friend agreed and when we looked back up within a couple of minutes both stars completely disappeared.  when we checked later (half an hour) they were still gone.  i've checked every night since and have not seen any stars in the position we viewed them on sunday the 14th.  there were no clouds in the sky.
content.summary: 2 very bright,star-like objects completely disappeared before my eyes (and a friend).  i had just commented to my friend how bright the two stars were in the southern sky.  within 5 minutes they disappeared.  we observed no clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out at 10 pm to feed the dog and pray a bit. i came out on the porch (which naturally turns me to the east) and here was the moon, rising huge and full and beautiful and… wait… (looking over my right shoulder) the moon is up there… what is that?

i could not figure it out. it looked like an illuminated taj mahal. this huge round lighted sphere (huge huge) with a couple of posts (one to either side). i had my phone with and snapped a couple of shots but could not really get a decent pic of it… i watched it for a few minutes and it did not move, or blink. there was no sound. just this light.

i turned and got dog food and fed dog, i turned back (maybe 2 minutes) and it was just gone. nothing anywhere. i don’t know what it was.... i just know i saw it and i have pics to prove i saw it.

i was fascinated by it. emotionally i don't know what i felt other than sheer surprise. i see a lot of odd stuff out here at night. i was just amazed.
content.summary: It looked like the taj mahal. a sphere with two towers beside it. sphere was brilliant white. towers were black.

content.detailedDescription:
lighted 3  triangular crafts sighted within  minutes of each other 

hello, this is to report a multiple sighting of triangular objects that were observed withing 17 mins of each other, location was at private house back yard near oak tree rd , edison, nj …........ here's the story

with the wash out of the perseid meteor shower  give  it another chance so set up lawn chairs and waited, saw few steaks but nothing spectacular.....

but at approx 4:10 am edt  observed a craft that was directly overhead traveling from south to north,it was shaped like an acute triangle with long sides and had a blue white light on front of it and two rectangular type lights on each side ..The lights were a diff color than the stars and when the craft would go in front of star it would blot it  out ….....I would say this  craft was orbital, for it traveled my field of view in 15-20 secs and was very high in night sky also it did not shimmer like the stars did, just solid blue /white lights …........

then to   my  surprise spotted another craft of this type a few mins later (17) but it was to east on a south east to north west track, approx 70 degrees  and moving at same speed  as prior one.............. and  then another lighted triangle appeared but it was about 6 secs behind this one, having follow same track but as it drew near it acted in herky jerky manner, slowing down and speeding up at times....Lost sight of these objects as they left my field of view to the left(nw)

objects  observed were about size of three pencil erasers held at arms length  , and high  up in the sky........... temp was 80 deg hazy hot and humid with a broken cloud cover that would dissipate at times ….........Sure looked strange and seeing the iss station at times these craft looked nothing like that or any other terrestrial craft .....I feel they are of foreign origin …......Wierd!
content.summary: Three triangular craft observed at high alititude while observing persieds

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving home from a picnic and were almost home when i noticed a sundog (natural atmospheric phenomenon) in the sky. it was about 7:15 p.M. and the sun was low in the sky. i told my husband i wanted to get a photo of the sundog and knowing i wouldn't be able to get a good view in our own yard due to trees, we drove a little ways beyond our driveway. my husband was driving and he pulled over to the shoulder of the road. we live on 65 acres in a rural area and we pulled over in front of an open field which is part of our property. there are large electrical transmission towers which run through this field and these are visible in the photos i took. i jumped out of our truck and snapped 4 consecutive photos on my phone. (samsung galaxy s5) my husband stayed inside the truck. we then drove to our house. i wanted to share a photo of the sundog to facebook and so i was trying to choose the best photo of the four. after deleting two of them, i was debating between the two remaining. that's when i noticed something strange in one of the photos. i enlarged it (on my phone) and to the left of the sundog there was a large circle with what appeared to be four lights or objects within the circle. i then enlarged the second photo and the circle was also visible but was now to the right of the sundog and positioned higher in the sky. the four lights/objects within the circle were also in a different pattern. i showed the photos to my husband, and also sent them to my son and to my daughter and son-in-law. none of us can figure out what this is. i did not see this object while taking the photos. i also did not hear anything such as a plane, helicopter, etc... . in the photos, the setting sun is on the right and the sundog is to the left.
content.summary: Strange object/objects visible in photos taken of a sundog phenomena.

content.detailedDescription: not sure what it was some say it was a drone  definitely not a balloon not a helicopter not an airplane d
content.summary: i'm retired police officer object just appeared in the sky saw it  hovering  change colors slowly desend straight see video

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting occurred between 9pm-10pm.  driving home from my parents after bbq, and was first observed by my son.  as we were turning onto the street where we park, my son excitedly yelled, "dad look a ufo!"  i assumed he just seen a plane or a firework, but the object he had seen caught my eye looking straight above, out of my car's windshield.  it was moving in the same direction as we were, so i continued so i could park and get a better look.  this object was flying low but i would say it was about 10-15 stories high. it had a triangle like shape with very unique lights at three points, with a unique glowing pulse.  i was driving about 20 mph and about ready to pull into my parking spot, and the speed of this object seemed to be slightly faster.  the reason i say this is because as i pull in to get out and get a better look, the object hovered steadily with no noise heading north west bound.  looking at google maps, and the direction of the object, if it had continued in the same direction, it looked to be going toward tesson ferry near st. anthony's hospital. 
my wife was also in the car and she also seen the object but was not sure what it was.  my initial thoughts were possibly a drone?  it just seemed way too big for anyone to fly whatever it was remotely.  it also made absolutely no noise.  the way that this thing hovered or flew, was very ominous and for the moments we observed it, i felt uneasy.  
i have never seen anything fly like this thing was flying, and i wanted to post this to see if anyone else had seen this object.  i searched online for any similar sightings, since it had been the 4th of july weekend.  i figured many people were watching fireworks and possibly observed this thing. very unusual object!
content.summary: Triangle shape, but based on very unusual lights pulsing.  exterior was almost pitch black.  seemed low altitude, and hovered.  no sound.

content.detailedDescription: We were at archer park in north tulsa, oklahoma. on august 16 2016 at 9:21 pm central time, i looked up to the south sky and witnessed a bright light traveling south to north and almost overhead. as we watched it get closer, it appeared to be a fireball flying through the sky. the object flew in a straight line, with no sound at all, overhead and continued north. the object traveled about a quarter mile north of us and then flashed a couple times and then the light went out. there was a faint puff of smoke and as the smoke cleared we were able to see a black orb. it appeared the black orb was emitting fire like light and when the light was out it was barely visible in the evening sky. the black orb appeared to be the size of a basketball from our perception. we watched the black orb continue north for a few seconds until it was out of sight. when we made it home, people at home were outside and also witnessed the object from their location. the entire sighting time was 3 minutes. i began recording video after it passed overhead. and recorded until out of sight. unable to see the black orb on video because it was too dark.
content.summary: Firey orb over north tulsa

content.detailedDescription:
I'm working in the field called itc i capturing and experimenting the paranormal.
i filmed a small cup of water and filmed it while shaking the water against the sunlight.
before i started i been asking to show if aliens are existing in the way we think we know them.'
a couple days later i did a session and captured this image i made more and also have video's.
content.summary: Water video itc

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Personally watch the sky for an hour or so every night.  interesting object i have not witnessed thus far - was just out the previous evening surveying celestial objects.  

viewed through nikon medallion s binoculars (8x21 - 6.3 f.O.V.)

description of object:

-  brilliant, red, green, white and amber lights 

-  spontaneous/unpredictable patterns and diminishing, then sudden brightening light.  with binoculars, almost appeared to have left and right spontaneously and alternating flashing lights.

-  located w/sw ~30 degrees above w horizon.  located immediately left and level with saturn.  roughly same magnitude, then sudden spectral changes and intensity which made it stand out in contrast to the already brilliant saturn.

-  lingered in position with saturn then began steady straight path towards w horizon until non-visible.

as a routine sky watcher, this is the first object to catch my attention in a long time.  noticed very similar descriptions in mufon last twenty manifest.  will start looking for same phenomena tomorrow evening for sure.
content.summary: Strobe object - s/sw and level - to left of saturn.  departed over horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I was fishing with my son standing off shore in about 3 ft of water. i injoy the out doors often looking at my suroundings. we had some clouds that day which were high in elevation (the big cotton ball type). as i was looking at the clouds,in the corner of my eye this simmer cough my attention. at first i thought maybe it was mylar balloon. this object was round in appearance and almost seemed to vibrate, it change colors from a bright white to a silvery chrome/gray. after watching this object for a minute i thought that no way this was a balloon. as high as it was even with the sun and possibly been a mylar balloon. the travel of this object didn't seem the gain altitude. at this point i was thinking that i was right and it was a balloon. after watching this object for another min i started second guessing myself,as a kid i would release balloons for fun some even had notes attached to them. the direction change of this object i have been watching was like no balloon i had ever released. the direction of the object was in a straight line heading northeastern passed above a cloud till it had came to a stop and change to a eastern direction. after the first direction change it would move then come to a stop and move again,the object did this three times before changing its direction to the north. this hole time there was no change in the size and no sound of this object. as it started moving to the north its speed was the same as my previous observation till it streaked out of sight. it a picked up so much speed it literally was a streak of light and it was gone. i am a very open minded person, but do injoy trying to debunk things this one has me baffled. maybe it was just a balloon or plane. this is one i can not explain.
content.summary: High in elevation changed speed and direction no sound

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was on my back deck sitting in a chair facing north watching for activity in the sky. at roughly 3:35 am i noticed what looked to be a bluish star begin to move and start blinking really fast. it seemed to be moving closer and descending. then it changed to a whiter brighter light and started to strobe or flash around 3 times. i had no idea what the object was from the get go since i don't know of anything in the sky that erratically flashes blue light and then takes on a new form with a new size and color. i was a bit nervous once i picked up on how low it got in such a quick time in such a gradual manner. i have seen several other unexplainable object similar to this but they were always in further distance so i was a bit startled when this object started emmiting extremely bright light, multiply in size and fade out practically into nothing. it started moving in a southeast direction, still descending moving towards the power lines near my house. it gave one last blast of strobing light that was so bright it made me blink my eyes before it disappeared behind the tree line in my back yard.
content.summary: Fast pulsing faint blue light to strobing bursts of extreme bright light

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard filming the sky at about 5:30 pm just before the sunset with my smartphone for about 2 mins. i then decided to upload the film to my computer and on going through the footage i noticed a fast moving object in the sky on film. my first thought was a bird, but on going through the footage frame by frame i soon saw that it was not a bird. 

i decided to take a closer look at the frames by saving them as still shots. 

what i found was a black object that moved extremely fast in the sky changing direction as it went. i also found that as it moved, it split into two objects and then three objects that kept moving apart from each other. i also noticed that the main object changed shape, from a sphere to a cube and a square with a dome shaped top in the most closest image. as it was travelling extremely fast it looks blurred at times and even see through. a common thing with fast moving objects and as i was using my smartphone, this was the best i could do in regards to photo`s.  

i have provided a few still shots so that you can see the object i captured splitting into two, then three. all that has been done to the still shots, is the photo has been zoomed in on the images and slightly darkened. in one of the still shots you can see a house roof as the object moves away and then comes back for a lower closer fly by. 

i have also provided the part of the filming that features these objects in them. it maybe hard to see the objects at first on watching the filming due to its speed. i suggest going through it frame by frame as i have done.

i posted these still photo`s on social media and someone told me that i should send them into mufon and so here they are. thanks for taking the time to look at these still photo`s and film for me. if you are able to get the images a lot more clearer than i could with your own stills i would be very thankful, so please feel free to do so.

kind regards,
orion silverstar.
content.summary: Square shaped black object with a dome top traveling very fast seen in evening sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was simply driving from my home in birmingham to a friend's home in pell city via i-20. i was well-rested and sober, the sun had set some time before. i first noticed the object as exceedingly bright light in my rearview mirror, and assumed it was a car behind me harassing me with its high beams. looking back turning my head and by using my mirror, i could see this object following along the highway at about 100 feet above or less, and all you could make of it was that it was extremely bright. it was going along the highway at probably about 85 mph because it overtook me after a bit, and as it went the path it took was brightly lit i.E. like the sun was up. for at least an area a couple football fields, this object was so bright that it lit up the ground like daylight and it was so bright that one could hardly see when it was within about 200 feet. after passing me, i decided it wasn't a helicopter or anything and concluded it must be some sort of drone. however, after passing me, it gained speed in what i guess i'd call an exponential manner, speeding up to about 200 mph over the course of a couple seconds, and after following the road about half a mile then adopting an upward trajectory. it was then that it started to gain a lot more speed, and i was slowly starting to doubt that it was any sort of drone or anything when it suddenly zipped into the sky, going so ungodly fast. it had not even gotten 3000 ft off the ground when it became so fast that it became a dot in the sky and disappeared. when i first saw the object i was annoyed, then i was confused, and finally i was briefly horrified and full of disbelief. i want to say it was some kind of ball lightning, except this was huge as far as ball lightning goes(the size of a car) and it was more oval-shaped to the point that it was almost shaped like a car(no features just elaborating on the particular kind of egg shape). i couldn't believe it when i first saw it, i told my friend when i got to his house and i assumed it would later be on the news; it wasn't.

i just read the below agreement and concluded i need to post the following amendment to it.

i do not grant mufon or any of its affiliates, exclusively, the rights or permission for use of my contribution. said parties may use the above submitted material but only within the limitations of "fair use," and if any profit or government grants or other funding results from my submission i demand 55% of said profits. 

furthermore, the below agreement is null; requiring such agreement is coercion.

any reproduction of this post must include the post in its entirety.

any disclosure of the above incident to news sources must include witness name and phone number.
content.summary: Hovering light-car of impossible speed?

content.detailedDescription: As i was staying outside smoking a cigarette me and my co-worker noticed it it was too high in the sky for me to get any footage.
content.summary: Two red lights one white

content.detailedDescription:
Walked out to driveway to get mail at about 2215 on monday night.   it had been overcast and rainy earlier in the day but at the observation time it was partly cloudy and a 3/4 moon. the moon was about due south and i looked at it a minute then looked to the right and immediately saw what looked like 3 bright stars in a perfect triangle with one on top and one to the lower right and lower left.  i watch them for about 15 minutes. i then went i and grabbed my iphone to see if i could get video of the moon then the triangle.   i attempted but the video appears too dark.   i then changed to still and snapped some pictures and some of which have the toof rack of my tahoe in the photos.   
after a few more minutes i went in the house and did not look to see if how long they stayed.  tonight is 100% cloudy so no observation possible.
content.summary: Perfect triangle formation.  did not move for more than 20 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside into my yard and noticed 3 bright lights in the sky.  they were in an area where i'd never seen a grouping such as this before. i viewed the lights with my nikon binoculars and observed the 3 lights to be much brighter/intense than the stars of the night sky. the moon was near full so much of the sky was washed out and it made these lights stand out.  as i was watching the lights the bottom 2 lights seem to more closer to each other so that i was able to see both without panning back and forth.  i continued to watch as they slowly drifted further to the southwest until a utility pole light's brightness made it difficult to focus.  i stopped observing the lights at this time.
content.summary: Three bright lights forming a large triangular shape in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
When i first saw this object, i was on highway rte 7 south danbury ct, just before the exit to the danbury fair mall. i have driven this stretch hundreds of times before. the time was approximately early or middle afternoon in the month of april, year 2016. i first noticed the object because it was shining and just within my field of view. it was above the horizon, but only because it was in sky that was between two large hillside, that almost make a v shape. i would eventually lose sight, as i traveled down the highway, which goes into the valley between the two hills. in this span of time i went from thinking just another aircraft to something maybe odd. now there is a small airport that planes fly over the highway to land at, and i have seen all types of small engine planes and a few helicopters here. none being military that i can recall. 
after noticing the object, i kept my eye on it because of a previous experience, i always make sure if possible. and as a short time passed i noticed no lights, just shining it was sunny fair weather, very slow movement that was hard to notice except for its proximity to the horizon. it always seemed to be close within a mile, not large, slow probably straight trajectory, and no altitude change. it was too far to distinguish shape, noise, color, and relative size. after i figured all this, i lost sight as the highway dipped into the valley that made the slight v on the horizon, where i initially saw it. it stayed closer to the left hill, and went behind it mostly due to my change of position, but its as well. when i saw it again, further down the highway, it was doubtfully within view of where i first made contact. i got the best view now of it. it had become stationary approximately 100 ft off the ground, over swampy water just before a side road on the left of the highway, about 250ft left of the highway when traveling southbound, and a little less distance before the side road. there is a hill in the background of the view i had and at one point it was below the top of this hill, as i was driving approximately 50-60mph the whole time. as i was passing it i could tell it was of metallic color, reflecting sunlight, cube shaped with slightly rounded sides, had no emissions or sound, nothing attached to it. size was at most 15ft least 6ft at any of its sides. no definable corners or edegs, almost like a silver mylar cube balloon. this was an obvious thought especially, because when i had come up on it the second time it was not moving, i was driving and did not notice any type of wind speed or direction. but just after i passed it, i started looking back out my side window, it started to move at a barely noticeable pace again towards the highway, but lost sight of it for the last time, due to the highway directional change. i could not tell if it had actually gotten to the highway or not.
this was my second unusual sighting at the time and felt incredibly personal, like on a spiritual level as did my first. at the time of this report, august 16th 2016 approx 1130pm i have had three ufo encounters and the third was just 2 days ago and felt no where near like the first two, much more coincidental. i have not made a report on my first and last encounters but plan to do so in the future. also have a possible spirit or entity sighting in an area where i've seen an unusual non aerial light, if you would like those two also, confirmation would be nice. best regards and thanks for what you do.
content.summary: First saw on rte 7 south nxt to danbury airport, lost sight odject movement/terrain change, passed object near danbury/ridgefield border

content.detailedDescription:
Getting ready to go to bed i do a perimeter check of my back yard.
thought it looked to low, too big and too bright to be a star
object did not move
thought it looked out of place so i to pictures 
it did not go away, i went to bed. 
i have pictures but they would not load with your software.
content.summary: When looking at the moon i noticed this star sitting low in the horizon. looked too low, too big and too bright to be a star. i took several pictures then edited the photo today for a super close up.Look. in the middle of this bright light there is a door
